title: Episode 96 (video): Mnemonics Advanced: The Pegword System Part 2
description: In the last episode you saw me memorize - almost perfectly - a list of 20 top sci-fi movies.  How did I do it?  In this video learn exactly how the advanced pegword system works.   I'll show you how each number becomes a letter, each letter becomes a word and each word becomes an image that will help you memorize just about any size list.  Skeptical?  You won't be after seeing exactly how it's done.
